eu.h2020.helios_social.modules.socialgraphmining

Class SocialGraphMiner

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.h2020.helios_social.modules.socialgraphmining.SocialGraphMiner
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CentralizedGNNMiner, DifferenceMiner, GNNMiner, MemoryMiner, PPRMiner, ProbabilityMiner, RandomMiner, RepeatAndReplyMiner, SwitchableMiner, TFMiner

    public abstract class SocialGraphMiner
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides an abstraction of the basic capabilities and requirements of graph mining algorithms.
    Author:
    Emmanouil Krasanakis

    • Method Detail

      • getContextualEgoNetwork

        public eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.ContextualEgoNetwork getContextualEgoNetwork()

      • newInteractionParameters

        public abstract void newInteractionParameters(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Interaction interaction,
                                              SocialGraphMiner.SocialGraphMinerParameters neighborModelParameters,
                                              SocialGraphMiner.InteractionType interactionType)

      • newInteraction

        public final void newInteraction(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Interaction interaction,
                                 java.lang.String neighborModelParameters,
                                 SocialGraphMiner.InteractionType interactionType)
        Makes the graph miner aware that a user received an interaction from another user with getModelParameters(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Interaction).
        Parameters:
        interaction - A new interaction the user initiates expressed in terms of the contextual ego network
        neighborModelParameters - The neighbor parameters. May be null for when interactionType==SEND.
        interactionType - The type of the interaction (SEND, RECEIVE or RECEIVE_REPLY corresponds to acknowledging the receive).

      • setSendPermision

        public SocialGraphMiner setSendPermision(boolean sendPermision)
        Sets whether the miner is permitted to send parameters when asked to, thus helping write seamless code, especially when multiple miner parameters are simultaneously send by SwitchableMiner. Setting send permisions to true> makes miners work as intended, but setting them to false would force them to not send parameters that would improve recommendations for others.
        Parameters:
        sendPermision - Whether to allow the miner to send parameters.
        Returns:
        this miner

      • getModelParameterObject

        public final SocialGraphMiner.SocialGraphMinerParameters getModelParameterObject(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Interaction interaction)
        Retrieves the parameters of the mining model that will be sent alongside the created interaction. Prefer use of getModelParameters(Interaction) to guarantee correct serialization, though the two methods can used interchangeably. This functionality can be reduced to sending a null by setSendPermision(boolean)
        Parameters:
        interaction - The new interaction the user receives expressed in terms of the contextual ego network
        Returns:
        A SocialGraphMiner.SocialGraphMinerParameters object of miner parameters.

      • getModelParameters

        public final java.lang.String getModelParameters(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Interaction interaction)
        Retrieves the parameters of the mining model that will be sent alongside the created interaction. This uses the contextual ego network's serializer to convert the outcome of getModelParameterObject(Interaction) to a string representation. The two methods can used interchangeably. This functionality can be reduced to sending a serialized null by setSendPermision(boolean)
        Parameters:
        interaction - The new interaction the user receives expressed in terms of the contextual ego network
        Returns:
        A String serialization of model parameters.

      • predictNewInteraction

        public abstract double predictNewInteraction(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Context context,
                                             eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Node destinationNode)
        Predicts the weight of performing a SEND interaction between the given context's ego and a destination node within a given context. This method should typically return values in the [0,1] range, where higher values correspond to more likely interactions.
        Parameters:
        context - The context in which to perform the prediction.
        destinationNode - The destination node of the interaction.
        Returns:
        The weight of performing the interaction (higher values are more likely).

      • recommendInteractions

        public java.util.HashMap<eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Node,java.lang.Double> recommendInteractions(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Context context)
        Calls predictNewInteraction(Context, Node) to score the likelihood of interacting with all nodes of the given context.
        Parameters:
        context - The context for which to recommend interactions.
        Returns:
        A hash map of node scores (larger is more likely to occur.
